mapper.select: select count(*) from board where subject like concat('%',#{search},'%');
mapper.insert: insert into board(no, subject, requirepoint, content, writeday) values(#{no}, #{subject}, #{requirepoint}, #{content}, now())
mapper.select: select max(board_no) from board where no=#{no}

mapper.update: update board set readcount=readcount+1 where board_no = #{board_no}
